subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: If any quality defines Novak Djokovic, the world No. 1 in tennis, it is his flexibility, some of it natural and some of it a result of his commitment to stretching.
snippet: If any quality defines Novak Djokovic, the world No. 1 in tennis, it is his flexibility, some of it natural and some of it a result of his commitment to stretching.
